MonsterTrait.Name: Evasion
MonsterTrait.Text: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

MonsterTrait.Name: Stunning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Unarmored Defense
MonsterTrait.Text: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

MonsterTrait.Name: Unarmored Movement
MonsterTrait.Text: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

MonsterAction.Name: Unarmed Strike
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry and Counter
MonsterTrait.Text: Hellenrae adds 3 to her AC against one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit her. To do so, she must be able to sense the attacker with her blindsight. If the attack misses, Hellenrae can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within her reach.
